lines.text:
[In the middle of a scene, a wolf goes by chasing Little Red Riding Hood; Screwy stops him]
Wait a minute, pal. You're in the wrong picture, ain't ya, man?
See? The Screwy Truant, featuring Screwy Squirrel.
Hmm. One of them corny B-pictures, eh?
Oh, yeah? Listen, you. If you were my size, I'd bust you right in the nose.
[Wolf shrinks down to Screwy's size; Screwy shrinks even smaller and runs away]
Duh - gee whiz. He hit me with everything but the kitchen sink.
Well, don't want to disappoint you, chum.
I got you, didn't I? Why ain't you in school?
Don't worry. I've got a plenty good reason.
[after dispatching the truant officer, Screwy pulls down the end title card]
Well, that's that. Now that dumb truant officer never will know why I wasn't in school.
Oh, yeah? Go on, tell me. Why wasn't you in school?
